topic.id: SELECT messages.message_message FROM messages  JOIN topics ON messages.common_column = topics.common_column WHERE messages.message_toUser IN (%s) AND messages.message_id IN (%s) AND topics.id_topic IN (%s);

touser.id: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_toUser IN (%s) and id_message IN (%s)
touser.by_user: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_toUser IN (%s) and message_user IN (%s)
touser.regex: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_toUser IN (%s) and message_message REGEXP %s

topic.id: SELECT message_message  FROM messages  WHERE message_topic IN (SELECT id_topic FROM topic WHERE topic_forum IN (%s)) AND message_id IN (%s);
topic.by_user: SELECT message_message  FROM messages  WHERE message_topic IN (SELECT id_topic FROM topic WHERE topic_forum IN (%s)) AND message_user IN (%s);
topic.regex: SELECT message_message  FROM messages  WHERE message_topic IN (SELECT id_topic FROM topic WHERE topic_forum IN (%s)) AND message_message REGEXP %s;

forum.id: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE id_forum = %s AND message_id IN (%s);
forum.by_user: SELECT m.message_message FROM messages m WHERE m.id_forum = %s AND m.message_user IN (%s)
forum.regex: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE id_forum = %s AND message_user NOT REGEXP %s;

topic.id: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE id_message IN (%s) AND message_topic IN (%s);
topic.by_user: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_user IN (%s) AND message_topic IN (%s);
topic.regex: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_message REGEXP %s AND message_topic IN (%s);

id: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE id_message IN (%s);
by_user: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_user IN (%s);
regex: SELECT message_message FROM messages WHERE message_message REGEXP %s;
